title: Fix market finder - not finding 15-minute markets
description:
The market finder is returning 0 active 15-minute markets, which may indicate:

1. API endpoint changed or broken
2. Market scraping logic not working
3. No 15-minute markets currently available (unlikely 24/7)
4. VPN/proxy issues blocking requests
5. Response parsing errors

**Investigation needed:**
- Check Gamma API response manually
- Verify polymarket.com/crypto/15M page structure
- Check if markets exist but filtering is too strict
- Review HTTP proxy configuration
- Add better error logging/diagnostics

**Logs show:**
```
Found 0 active 15-minute BTC markets
Found 0 active 15-minute ETH markets
Refreshed market cache total_markets=0 tradeable=0
```

This is blocking the bot from doing anything useful.

title: Standardize error handling
description: Replace broad except Exception with specific exception handling

title: Test drive health check script
description: Verify scripts/check-drive-health.sh works correctly

title: Purchase 6x Seagate IronWolf 8TB drives
description:
Purchase 6x Seagate IronWolf 8TB NAS drives for new RAID-Z2 pool.

## Product
- **Model**: Seagate IronWolf 8TB (ST8000VN004)
- **Quantity**: 6 drives
- **Price**: ~$150-170 each
- **Total**: ~$900-1020

## Purchase Links
- Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/s?k=Seagate+IronWolf+8TB
- Newegg: https://www.newegg.com/p/pl?d=seagate+ironwolf+8tb
- B&H Photo: https://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/search?q=seagate%20ironwolf%208tb

## Specifications
- 7200 RPM
- 256MB Cache
- CMR (not SMR) - important for ZFS
- 3-year warranty
- Designed for NAS (1M hours MTBF)

## Notes
- Consider buying from 2-3 different batches/retailers to avoid same-batch failures
- IronWolf Pro available for ~$50 more per drive (5-year warranty, better specs)

title: Homepage cleanup: Social/News + Gaming + Trading icons
description: Update Social & News category and fix remaining icons

title: Create Gabagool arbitrage strategy
description: Core strategy logic: calculate_mispricing(), should_enter() when spread > 2 cents, calculate_position_sizes() with inverse weighting (buy more of cheaper side). Implement dual-leg execution for YES+NO orders.

title: Create market finder for 15-minute markets
description: Query Gamma API to discover active BTC/ETH 15-minute up/down markets. Extract YES/NO token IDs. Track market resolution times. Cache market metadata.

title: Create position sizing module
description: Spread-based sizing formula: full size at 5 cent spread, scaled for smaller spreads. Inverse weighting: buy_yes = no_price/(yes+no), buy_no = yes_price/(yes+no). Max $5 per trade, $10 per window.

title: Homepage: Improve layout configuration
description: Update settings.yaml with better layout: row-based groups with column counts, statusStyle: dot, useEqualHeights: true, showStats: true, optionally collapse Infrastructure group.

title: Create real-time order book tracker
description: Maintain real-time order book state from WebSocket. Track YES/NO best bid/ask prices. Calculate spread (1.0 - YES - NO) continuously. Emit opportunity signals when spread > threshold.

title: Setup new 6-drive RAID-Z2 pool (two-pool strategy)
description: Create new 6-drive RAID-Z2 pool alongside existing 4-drive pool. See agents/plans/ZFS_TWO_POOL_STRATEGY.md

title: Migrate ZFS from RAID-Z1 to RAID-Z2 (8 drives)
description: Migrate from 4-drive RAID-Z1 pool to 8-drive RAID-Z2 for better redundancy. See agents/plans/ZFS_RAIDZ1_TO_RAIDZ2_MIGRATION.md

title: Remove backward compat duplication in strategy.py
description: Remove duplicate enums in src/core/strategy.py

title: Create main.py entry point and runner
description: Main async event loop. Initialize client, WebSocket, strategies. Monitor markets continuously. Execute trades when opportunities detected. Handle graceful shutdown. Implement dry-run mode.

title: Homepage: Add service widgets for live data
description: Add Homepage service widgets to show live stats: Sonarr (wanted/queue), Radarr (missing/queue), Plex (streams/library), Overseerr (requests), qBittorrent (speeds), Immich (photos/storage), Home Assistant (entities), Paperless-ngx (docs/inbox), FreshRSS (unread), Mealie (recipes), Grafana (alerts). Requires API keys from each service.

title: Create wallet position tracker
description:
Create WalletTracker class to monitor target wallet positions via Gamma API.

File: src/monitoring/wallet_tracker.py

Features:
- Fetch current positions for any wallet address
- Track last known positions for change detection
- Async HTTP client with retry logic
- Rate limiting to avoid API throttling

API endpoint: GET {gamma_url}/users/{address}/positions

title: Polymarket Gabagool Arbitrage Trading Bot
description: Implement the gabagool22 asymmetric binary arbitrage strategy for Polymarket BTC/ETH 15-minute up/down markets. Strategy exploits temporary mispricing when YES+NO sum drops below $1.00, guaranteeing profit regardless of price direction. Starting capital: $100 USDC.

title: Create WebSocket streaming client
description: Connect to wss://ws-subscriptions-clob.polymarket.com/ws. Subscribe to BTC/ETH 15-minute market order books. Parse real-time price updates with orjson. Implement auto-reconnection logic.

title: Create position change detector
description:
Implement position change detection logic in WalletTracker.

Features:
- detect_changes() method comparing current vs last positions
- Detect new positions (token_id not in last_positions)
- Detect closed positions (token_id no longer present)
- Detect size changes (same token_id, different size)
- Return structured change object for strategy consumption

title: WebSocket testing
description: Add WebSocket tests (no WS tests currently)

title: Create copy trading strategy class
description:
Implement CopyTradingStrategy class extending BaseStrategy.

File: src/strategies/copy_trading.py

Features:
- Process position changes from WalletTracker
- Calculate position size based on multiplier and limits
- Execute trades via PolymarketClient
- Track our mirrored positions
- Handle partial fills and retries

Config:
- size_multiplier (1.0 = same size as target)
- max_position_size (USD cap per position)
- min_position_size (skip small positions)

title: Media-Download Directory Cleanup
description: Clean up apps/media-download/ by removing stale files and outdated plans

description: Set up automated alerts for drive health issues (email, webhook, or Grafana integration)

description: Reduce boilerplate in 13 providers

title: Enable Gabagool live trading (disable dry-run)
description:
Switch Gabagool bot from dry-run to live trading mode:
1. Review dry-run performance on dashboard
2. Fund Polymarket wallet with USDC ($100 starting capital)
3. Verify API credentials work for trading (test order)
4. Update server .env: GABAGOOL_DRY_RUN=false
5. Restart container and monitor first trades
6. Set up alerting for errors/losses

Prerequisites:
- Wallet funded with USDC on Polygon
- API credentials generated and working
- Confidence in dry-run performance

title: Set up UniFi network with AdGuard DNS
description:
Replace Google Home mesh with UniFi Dream Machine + U6+ AP:

1. Initial Setup:
   - Connect UDM to modem
   - Configure via UniFi mobile app or web UI
   - Set up WiFi networks (2.4GHz + 5GHz)

2. DNS Configuration:
   - Point DNS to AdGuard Home (192.168.86.47 or new IP)
   - Disable UDM's built-in DNS features if needed

3. Optional VLAN Setup:
   - IoT network (isolated)
   - Server network
   - Trusted devices network

4. Install U6+ AP:
   - Mount in location for best coverage
   - Connect via PoE to UDM
   - Adopt in UniFi controller

5. Verify local network works without internet:
   - Disconnect WAN
   - Test ping to server
   - Test service access by IP

title: Homepage: Add additional info widgets
description: Consider adding: Glances (detailed system monitoring), Stocks widget (trading tickers), Calendar widget (Google/Caldav events).

description: Add rate limiting, exit code filtering (only 128), dependency chain handling, and improved error handling to prevent restart loops.

title: Create basic n8n auto-restart workflow for gluetun-dependent containers

title: Create Polymarket CLOB client wrapper
description: Wrap py-clob-client with connection management, authentication, market data fetching, and order placement. Implement get_markets(), get_order_book(), create_market_order(), create_limit_order().

title: Hardware Upgrade Plan
description:
Planned hardware upgrades for the home server infrastructure.

## Network (~$300)
- [ ] UniFi Dream Machine (~$199) + U6+ AP (~$99)
- Replace Google WiFi (isolates devices when internet down)

## Storage (~$900-1000)
- [ ] 6x Seagate IronWolf 8TB drives (~$150-170 each)
- For new RAID-Z2 pool (see epic 40h)

## Total Estimated: ~$1,200-1,300

This epic tracks purchasing decisions and planned hardware investments.

title: Polymarket Copy Trading Strategy
description:
Implement copy trading strategy for Polymarket bot. Unlike Gabagool arbitrage (guaranteed small profits), copy trading mirrors positions from successful traders with higher risk/reward.

Key components:
1. Wallet tracker - Monitor target wallet positions via Gamma API
2. Position detector - Detect new/changed/closed positions  
3. Copy strategy - Replicate positions with configurable sizing
4. Risk management - Max position size, max exposure per market

Configuration needed:
- TARGET_WALLET_ADDRESS
- POLL_INTERVAL_SECONDS
- COPY_SIZE_MULTIPLIER
- COPY_MAX_POSITION_SIZE

Reference: Original plan in agents/plans/polymarket-trading-bot-plan.md Phase 3

title: Test and verify n8n auto-restart workflow
description: Test the auto-restart workflow with various scenarios: stopped containers, gluetun unhealthy, multiple containers, edge cases. Verify no false positives and proper restart behavior.

title: Homepage: Add missing services
description: Add running services not yet on Homepage: InfluxDB, Loki/Promtail logging stack, Ollama (model info).

title: Standardize Traefik config: local DNS no-auth, external auth
description: Apply consistent Traefik configuration pattern across all apps. Local network (192.168.86.0/24) access without auth, external requires auth.

title: UI WebSocket integration
description: Dashboard real-time updates via WebSocket

title: Homepage cleanup: Media apps category + icons
description: Update all media apps to use si-* icons

title: Add copy trading config and integration
description:
Integrate copy trading into bot configuration and main.py.

Tasks:
1. Add CopyTradingConfig to config.py with env vars
2. Update .env.template with copy trading variables
3. Add strategy initialization to main.py
4. Support running both strategies concurrently (or exclusively)
5. Add dashboard support for copy trading trades

Config vars:
- COPY_TRADING_ENABLED
- TARGET_WALLET_ADDRESS  
- POLL_INTERVAL_SECONDS
- COPY_SIZE_MULTIPLIER
- COPY_MAX_POSITION_SIZE

title: Purchase UniFi Dream Machine + U6+ AP
description:
Purchase UniFi networking equipment (~$300 total):
- UniFi Dream Machine (UDM) - ~$199: https://store.ui.com/us/en/products/udm
- UniFi U6+ Access Point - ~$99: https://store.ui.com/us/en/products/u6-plus

Reason for upgrade: Google Home WiFi isolates devices when internet is down, preventing local network access to server. UniFi operates fully locally without cloud dependency.

Alternative purchase locations:
- Amazon (verify authorized seller)
- B&H Photo
- Newegg

title: Create circuit breaker and risk management
description: Pre-trade validation (YES+NO < 1.00), daily loss tracking ($5 limit), max exposure per window ($10), max unhedged exposure, slippage monitoring. Implement trading halt at multiple severity levels.

title: Integration testing and dry-run validation
description: Run in dry-run mode for 24 hours. Verify correct opportunity detection. Validate position sizing calculations. Test circuit breaker triggers. Confirm WebSocket reconnection.

title: Add live market analysis panel to dashboard
description:
Add real-time visibility into what the bot is analyzing and why it's making (or not making) trades.

**Market Display Panel:**
- All 15-minute BTC/ETH markets currently being monitored
- Current YES/NO prices for each market
- The spread (gap from $1.00) 
- Time remaining until resolution
- Live polling updates via SSE (2-5 second refresh)

**Decision Logic Display:**
For each market, show why it's NOT trading:
- 'Spread 1.2¢ < 2¢ threshold' (not profitable enough)
- '45 seconds remaining < 60s minimum' (too close to expiry)
- 'Daily exposure limit reached'
- 'Circuit breaker active'
- etc.

**Opportunity Display:**
When an opportunity IS found:
- 'OPPORTUNITY: BTC 15min - Spread 3.2¢ - Executing...'
- Or in dry-run: 'WOULD TRADE: ...'

**Implementation:**
1. Add market analysis state to dashboard.py stats
2. Broadcast market updates via existing SSE infrastructure
3. Add new 'Live Markets' panel to dashboard HTML
4. Strategy should emit analysis events with decision reasoning
5. Show 'No active markets' state when market finder returns empty

title: Add Prometheus metrics and monitoring
description: Track: market_spread_cents, expected_profit_usd, unhedged_exposure, order_latency_ms, daily_profit_usd, circuit_breaker_level. Set up alerting rules.

title: Create Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml
description: Python 3.11 container. Mount .env file. Add to traefik network. Configure VPN container (gluetun) for geo-routing. Add homepage labels.

title: Create .env.template and config.py
description: Create .env.template with wallet credentials, API keys, Gabagool strategy settings (min_spread, position sizing, risk limits). Create config.py with Pydantic settings classes: PolymarketConfig and GabagoolConfig.
